body_html: I can repro both on 0.4 source tree compiled from source with cuda 9.1, and with 0.4 cuda 9.1 binary package (on V100). It's a cublas bug, workaround would be to reduce batched gemm batch size (128*1152 in this case) to below 65536.

body: I can repro both on 0.4 source tree compiled from source with cuda 9.1, and with 0.4 cuda 9.1 binary package (on V100). It's a cublas bug, workaround would be to reduce batched gemm batch size (128*1152 in this case) to below 65536.
